question:
Write a letter to your friend from a different country. Invite him/ her to a party at your home and include the following:
- what the party is about
- give directions how to get to your place
- suggest how to accommodate him/ her
text: It seems like ages we haven't met each other and time indeed flies quickly. I am very sorry that I had not been in touch with you as I had been terribly busy. I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am writing this letter to invite my brother' birthday party  next week Friday evening.

I have been planning to invite my relatives and closed-friends, for sure, you are one of them. My mom will be going to treat her special chicken B.B.Q, cocktail and snacks on that day. You can reach easily  the address by using Google Maps as well as by taxi and please tell him that my home is beside Siam Commercial Bank and opposite Cherry Hill Hotel on Kabaraye Road. By the way, the number is 27 B, white colour two-storey building.

Furthermore, I have prepared a room for you to stay in during the trip to Yangon and my room will be attached with yours. All of my family are also excited to meet with you as we are apart almost three years after the last vacation trip. You may definitely enjoy staying at my home that I can imagine.
Looking forward to seeing you soon.
